p: Research in this area is scarce and, few other studies have examined VR as a tool for increasing preparedness for patients with breast cancer about to undergo RT that also includes follow-ups up to six months after completed treatment. Previous studies on VR for the same purpose are small e.g. [ 12], while yet including a control and intervention group. Other studies such as [ 9] that intends to improve patient education for patient with RT, are not based on VR tools.
